structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: County attorney to represent commission -- Additional counsel.
law.text: The county attorney shall represent the commission, but the commission may employ additional counsel when the amount of its legal work requires this.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 18, effective June 19, 1952.
